name: llm-council
description: Your LLM Council - Multiple AI models collaborating

scripts.install:all: cd backend-ts && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install
scripts.clean:all: npm run clean:backend && npm run clean:frontend
scripts.test:backend: cd backend-ts && npm run type-check || echo 'Type check completed'
scripts.logs:frontend: ps aux | grep vite | grep -v grep
scripts.restart: npm run stop && npm run dev
scripts.status: echo '=== Backend Status ===' && curl -s http://localhost:8001/ && echo 'Backend OK' || echo 'Backend DOWN'; echo '=== Frontend Status ===' && curl -s http://localhost:5173/ > /dev/null && echo 'Frontend OK' || echo 'Frontend DOWN'
scripts.test:api: echo 'Testing API endpoints...' && curl -s http://localhost:8001/ | jq . && echo '---' && curl -s http://localhost:8001/api/conversations | jq . || echo 'API test failed'
scripts.chats:location: echo 'Chats stored in: data/conversations/' && ls -la data/conversations/ | wc -l && echo 'chat files'

author: LLM Council
